column7: passed away at 6:29 am friday june 19
column8: 2015 at the elms nursing home in macomb. he was born may 2
column10: montana to sterl and agnes (carlstrum) wilson; he first married mary martha ford on august 25
column11: 1946 and had six children. linda (robert) howard of macomb
column21: illinois. he later married mary ellen krieg (surviving) on may 7

column28: arita ellen cook (deceased)he is also survived by a sister mary anna (wilbert) hoff of macomb
column30: 25 grandchildren; several great and great-great grandchildren. he was preceded in death by his parents
column33: a brother dan wilson and a sister ruth christine. clifford was raised in bardolph
column34: illinois and after graduating he served in the army during wwii. he lived and farmed in industry for many years. he retired from king seeley thermos after 30 years. he loved to travel and was a craftsman. he was a member of the vfw. he was a member of the church of jesus christ of latter-day saints. services will be at 10 am wednesday june 24
column35: 2015 at the church of jesus christ of latter-day saints. bishop matt thomas will officiate. visitation will be tuesday from 5-7 pm june 23

column37: mo. in lieu of flowers memorial contributions may be made to mc. donough district hospital hospice program or the elms nursing home. send sympathy card
